Headline: No trains between UIC-Halsted and Forest Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended btwn UIC-Halsted and Forest Park due to a mechanical problem nr Cicero. Shuttle bus UIC-Halsted to Forest Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between UIC-Halsted and Forest Park due to a mechanical problem near Cicero.

As a result, trains are operating only between O'Hare and UIC-Halsted at this time.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Shuttle bus available UIC-Halsted and Forest Park.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
